summary: This is the first in a series of small, simple, and functional baths for Hearthfire homes. Fully compatible with Bathing in Skyrim, iNeed and Frostfall, but does NOT require any of those mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]Please note: This mod DOES NOT add nudity![/size][i][size=6] [/size]
[size=3](However, if used with Bathing in Skyrim and a naked body type, it will.)[/size][/i][/center]


[size=3]This mod adds a bath house in a cellar that can be reached by an exterior trap door under the stairs of the Hearthfire home, [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Lakeview_Manor]Lakeview Manor[/url].

[/size][size=3][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/1bd5c4269ac9120f8a6a16d5e56da26f/tumblr_oqzk9iJm9w1wr9drqo2_1280.jpg[/img]

You will need to "dig" the cellar before you can access it for the first time, which prevents a random trapdoor in the middle of nowhere, if you haven't purchased Lakeview Manor  yet and also adds a little bit of BYOB immersion.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/f79309389b2f714ab900f4eb331a40b4/tumblr_oqzk9iJm9w1wr9drqo1_1280.jpg[/img][/size]

[b][size=5]

What this mod contains:[/size][/b]

[list]
[*][size=3]A bath with with enough water to bath in and a functioning and lore-friendly "wood burning heated shower" that you can turn on and off, using a gravity fed pull chain system. (You have to turn on the tap to use[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60421/?] Bathing in Skyrim[/url]'s shower option.)[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=3][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/66159e834e73ef2341cc4b6207c1bd79/tumblr_oqzk9iJm9w1wr9drqo4_1280.jpg[/img]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]A water source you can refill your [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/?]iNeed[/url] waterskin from (you need to turn on the tap and point your cursor at the base of the falling water, just like you would do with a waterfall, by using the 'Drink/Refill Hotkey' or by clicking on an empty waterskin.)[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=3][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/6a7debe2abed9e40d00563c575662880/tumblr_oqzk9iJm9w1wr9drqo5_1280.jpg[/img]

[/size][list]
[*][size=3]A fireplace for drying off after your shower (Compatible with Frostfall)[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/d8249eb2f04a189dcd70b3f17e0bdfd4/tumblr_oqzk9iJm9w1wr9drqo3_1280.jpg[/img]
[size=3]
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Wearable towels for immersion purposes, used with permission, see credits. (Female UNPCM type, works perfectly with regular UNP. They won't work on males and may not look right on other body types. Convert them if you wish or download another towel. CBBE users could try [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63219/?]this one[/url]. )[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=3][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/25591bb790e2bcd5902da1100003a2a9/tumblr_oqzkm5XAuj1wr9drqo1_1280.jpg[/img]
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Several custom containers for immersion purposes.[/size]
[/list][size=3][img]https://68.media.tumblr.com/2736caee0d8d3369b15f640b9bf3946f/tumblr_oqzkrzanje1wr9drqo1_1280.jpg[/img]
[/size][b][size=5][center][/center]
What this mod does NOT contain:[/size][/b]
[list]
[*][size=3]Scripting that adds any sort of bathing bonus on it's own (but it will work with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60421/?]Bathing in Skyrim[/url] perfectly and should theoretically work with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83385/?]Simple Bathing[/url], also.)[/size]
[*][size=3]Scripting that adds animations or removes clothing (but it should work with any mods that do so, especially [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60421/?]Bathing in Skyrim[/url].)[/size]
[/list][b][size=5][center][/center][/size][/b][b][u][size=6]FAQ
[/size][/u][/b]
[b][size=4]Why create another bath house mod? [/size]
[/b][size=2]I personally love the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35311/?]Showers in Inns [/url]and wanted something similar for my character at her Hearthfire home. I found several bath mods, but they either did much more than I wanted or didn't look the way I imagined.  [b](K[/b]eep [b]I[/b]t [b]S[/b]imple, [b]S[/b]weetheart.) I created this mod for my own use and then decided I might as well share it with you all. :-)
[/size]
[b][size=4]First in a series...? [/size][/b]Yes, I will be adding baths for all the Hearthfire properties.

[size=4][b]Will you port this over to SSE?
[/b][/size]Not planning on it, at this point. I used scripts and from what I understand, SSE isn't script friendly.

[size=4][b]Will you redecorate this bath for my _______ type character? They don't like all the books laying around.
[/b][/size]I may, repeat- MAY release versions that are specifically aimed at the three main playstyles at some point. For now, if you don't like it, feel free to change and redecorate as you see fit.

[b][size=4]I want my character to be naked while bathing, but I don't want all the females in the game to be naked when I loot them. What do I do? 
[/size][/b]I highly recommend using and customizing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44938/?]Isharas Custom Player Body[/url]. It will allow you to use a separate body type on your character than the other npcs use. This allows you to have a sfw underwear on NPCs, but not on the player character, if you so choose.
author: AlenisKendra
